AccountDetails.title: Account Details
AccountDetails.message: You're in the home stretch. Let's finish your listing:
AccountDetails.phoneNumbersMessage: We need at least your mobile number phone # to text or call about cancellations, bookings or other events.

validation_messages.businessName: Please provide a business name. If you are not incorporated or a "DBA" then please provide a business name for CoachList to use internally.
validation_messages.countryID: Please select a country from the available options
validation_messages.timezone: You must choose a contintent for your time zone
validation_messages.timezoneRequired: Time zones are required in order to sync calendars and display correct session times.
validation_messages.cityName: Please select a city from the available options
validation_messages.notFilled: You have not added any %{notFilled}. We will need your account information established before we can publish your profile; you can login at any time and complete any missing fields from your Dashboard.
validation_messages.email: Select a valid email format, e.g. name@email.com

AccountDetails.genderMessage: Why do we ask for this? Sometimes Athletes have a preference for a specific gender for training purposes, so this helps us filter better search results & matches.
AccountDetails.smsConfirmMessage: Allow coach list to send you SMS related to bookings etc.
AccountDetails.canSendReminder: I authorize CoachList to contact me on the phone number(s) provided with automated messages about upcoming sessions and information to help manage training sessions.
AccountDetails.canReceiveMarketingCall: I consent to receive telemarketing calls and text messages from or on behalf of CoachList at the phone number(s) provided above. I Understand that consent is not a condition of purchase.

BankPayoutDetails.title: Bank Payout Details
BankPayoutDetails.header: Please fill your bank account details so we can transfer money when athletes pays for a session.

validation_messages.holder: Select whether a personal or corporate bank account.
validation_messages.firstName: First name OR Name of Business is required
validation_messages.type: Select whether Savings or Checking account.

routingNumber.required: Routing number on the account is required.

BookingPreferences.title: Booking Preferences
BookingPreferences.message: When clients book sessions on your calendar, how do you want to accept their requests?

A.name: Auto Accept
A.description: Automatically accept all booking requests that clients make through CoachList (requires that you keep your calendar up to date at all times.)

N.name: Notify Me. I will Accept
N.description: Review each booking request and manually either accept or reject athlete requests.

BookingPreferences.cancellationPolicyMessage: Before clients can book, we need to let them know how you want to handle cancellations:

L.name: Lenient
L.description: Full refund, minus any service processing fees, if cancellation is done at least 24 hours prior to the session.
L.terms: If cancellation is done in less than 24 hours from the session start time, the Athlete must contact the SSP to request a future credit or make-up session at the SSP's discretion.

C.name: Compliant
C.description: Full refund, minus any service processing fees, if cancellation is done at least 5 days prior to the session.
C.terms: If cancellation is done in less than 5 days from the session start time, the Athlete must contact the SSP to request a future credit or make-up session at the SSP's discretion.

N.name: Narrow
N.description: 50% refund, minus any service processing fees, if cancellation is done at least 7 days prior to the session.
N.terms: If cancellation is done in less than 7 days from the session start time, the Athlete must contact the SSP to request a future credit or make-up session at the SSP's discretion.

cancellationPolicyTerms.term1: If, as an Athlete, you cancel your requested booking session before the requested booking is confirmed by a Sports Service Provider (SSP), CoachList will cancel any pre-authorization to your credit card and/or refund any nominal amounts charged to your credit card in connection with the requested booking within a commercially reasonable time.
cancellationPolicyTerms.term2: A bookingis officially canceled when you click the cancellation button on the cancellation  confirmation page, which can be found in Dashboard > Your Sessions> Change or Cancel .
cancellationPolicyTerms.term3: Cancellation policies may be superseded by extenuating circumstances, or cancellations by CoachList for any other reason included in the Terms of Service.
cancellationPolicyTerms.term4: If there is a complaint from either party, notice must be given to CoachList within 24 hours of the session.
cancellationPolicyTerms.term5: CoachList will be the mediatoras necessary, and has the final say in all disputes.

validation_messages.cancellationPolicy: You must choose a Cancellation Policy for your customers & clients.

BookingPreferences.closeAthleteBookingBeforeDesc: The minimum amount of time before a session can be booked.
BookingPreferences.bookingMessage: Please allow yourself enough time to respond to last minute requests and travel time.

BusinessModel.payPerBookingMessage: You pay nothing up front. CoachList only takes a percentage of each client training session you conduct, based on the business we generate for you.
BusinessModel.payPerBookingCoachlistMessage: CoachList keeps 25% of the first session, and 8 - 14% of each session thereafter.

validation_messages.businessModel: At this time, you must choose only the Pay Per Booking model.

DashboardRewards.three_ways_to_earn: 3 Ways to earn more reward points!

Profile.welcomeMessage: Welcome! What type of profile do you want to set up right now?
Profile.userDescription1: Coach, Trainer, Instructor, Camp, Clinic or Training Facility
Profile.message: that you can set up additional profiles once you've set up your first profile (you can be a coach, athlete, and parent!).

SportsServiceProvider.userDescription1: 1-1 coaching for athletes or fitness enthusiasts in a sport or fitness routine
SportsServiceProvider.userDescription2: Focused training for groups of athletes or fitness enthusiasts
SportsServiceProvider.userDescription3: Health club, gym, or other sport or fitness oriented instructional facility
SportsServiceProvider.userDescription4: Services such as Sports, Medicine, Nutrition, Psychology, Analysis, etc.
SportsServiceProvider.message: that you can start with one type of business and add to its once you have a basic profile. For example, you can sign up as a coach, then use CoachList to set up a camp when you're ready.

EarnRewards.refer_an_athlete_desc: When your friend joins & completes their first session, you earn!
EarnRewards.point_for_each_review: point everytime you write a review!
EarnRewards.use_commas: Use commas "," to send multiple email address
EarnRewards.share_url: or, share your unique URL via Facebook, Twitter or email.
EarnRewards.session_complete_desc: When you complete a training session with an athlete and receive a positive rating, you automatically receive X points. The more sessions you complete, the more points you earn toward the next level. As you reach higher levels, CoachList takes a smaller commission from each of your bookings. Complete sessions and earn more!
EarnRewards.review_desc: When you write a review of another service provider you have worked with, you automatically receive X points. The more reviews you write, the more points you earn toward the next level. As you reach higher levels, CoachList takes a smaller commission from each of your bookings. Complete sessions and earn more!

Level.how_reach_next_level: How to Reach the Next Level?
Level.next_level_desc: As you collect rewards points by referring other sports service providers, complete sessions and receive positive reviews, or write reviews, you reach new levels within CoachList. As you reach a new level, the commission that CoachList takes for your bookings decreases. Gain points and earn more!

SSPProfileListing.nickName_message: Your nickname will be a unique name that will be associated with your profile. Make one that you can easily remember. We have some ready-made suggestions for you to choose from here.
SSPProfileListing.nick_name_message: Your nickname is a unique name that will be associated with your profile. When you create a nickname, it appears in custom URLs that help people find, remember and message your Profile listing.  We have some ready-made suggestions for you to choose from:

nickName.valid: Please use only letters (a-z or A-Z), numbers, and hyphen

validation_messages.heading: Your profile must contain a listing heading.

Upload.title: Upload Photos
Upload.message: You must upload at least one action photo. Coaches with action photos get double the bookings! Photos must be a minimum resolution of 800 x 600px, and the width should be 1.5x the height (i.e. horizontal photos show better). Photos should demonstrate examples of you coaching teams or action shots that help prospective clients feel excited about working with you.

DashboardContentTop.congratulations: Congratulations on posting a profile on CoachList! We look forward to helping you grow your business as a sports services provider. In the mean time, here are some helpful hints about what you can do to manage your profile, attract athletes to you, and continue to expand your reach, and generally, how to get around. This is your Dashboard page, your Home page when you log back into CoachList. If you want to update your....
DashboardContentTop.more_feature: We are constantly working for more better and new features that will help you in your business.

DashboardContentTopModal.dashboard_desc: View how many sessions have been booked, your revenue, earings, a summary of reviews and your rewards.
DashboardContentTopModal.schedule_desc: Update your calendar availability, view who has booked with you, and add sessions to your calendar.
DashboardContentTopModal.sessions_desc: Create, modify and delete session types, such as adding group coaching sessions or adding different session types for different age groups or genders.
DashboardContentTopModal.profile_desc: Update your listing details, sports in which you instruct, your tarining preferences (ages, skill levels, individual versus group, gender and so on), and your photos and videos.

Welcome.title: Welcome back,
Welcome.message: Ready to go? Welcome back! Let's get your profile page posted. To actively publish your business on the CoachList marketplace
Welcome.message2: you'll just need to complete just a few more things:
Welcome.message3: Let's get you online so you can start getting athletes to book sessions with you!

sports_and_experince.p: Define the sports that you provide services for, and the amount of experience that you have both playing and teaching it. This will help us match you up with athletes that are looking for service providers like you.

training_preferences.p: Let us know what types of Athletes you prefer to work with. You can set Age Ranges, Skill Levels, Genders, and whether you provide Private or Group Sessions

set_pricinig.p: Set your refund policies and your pricing for private sessions, groups, or even entire teams. You can even setup pricing specific to age groups or skill levels.

define_training_locations.p: Let Athletes know how far you are willing to travel, then set up and save your favorite training locations.

define_sessions.p: Define session templates by setting Ages, Skill Levels, Locations, and session length. This will make it easier to organize your availability and schedule.

schedule_sessions.p: Drag and drop your Sessions directly onto your Calendar to create recurring events.

FinishLaterModal.title: Oops!

VerifyEmail.p3: Please check your email and apply the code below.

CongratulationModal.h2: Congratulations- you have a published profile!
CongratulationModal.p1: Clients can see your page and book sessions with you!
CongratulationModal.p2: We're going to take you to your dashboard. To modify your profile, select Profile from the Settings menu.
CongratulationModal.p3: We will also let you know what else you can to do make yourself stand out to potential clients and how to optimize your business!

CongratulationModalAthlete.h2: Congratulations- you have completed your profile!
CongratulationModalAthlete.p1: You can now search and book sessions with sports service providers!
CongratulationModalAthlete.p2: We're going to preselect your preferences for you. You may modify your preferences at any time from your dashboard
CongratulationModalAthlete.p3: We will also let you know what else you can do to make the best use of CoachList services!

ComingSoon.p2: Well notify you by email when this functionality is available and ready.
ComingSoon.p3: For anything you need right away, please feel free to contact us at any time at

EditSession.default: Include this %{terminology} in your dynamic session availability.  Manage your dynamic sessions in your Calendar Settings.
EditSession.default3: that appears by default when i add
EditSession.default4: to my calendar; you can change to any

terms.term1: If, as an Athlete, you cancel your requested booking session before the requested booking is confirmed by a Sports Service Provider (SSP), CoachList will cancel any pre-authorization to your credit card and/or refund any nominal amounts charged to your credit card in connection with the requested booking within a commercially reasonable time.
terms.term2: A bookingis officially canceled when you click the cancellation button on the cancellation  confirmation page, which can be found in Dashboard > Your Sessions> Change or Cancel .
terms.term3: Cancellation policies may be superseded by extenuating circumstances, or cancellations by CoachList for any other reason included in the Terms of Service.
terms.term4: If there is a complaint from either party, notice must be given to CoachList within 24 hours of the session.
terms.term5: CoachList will be the mediatoras necessary, and has the final say in all disputes.

L.msg1: Full refund, minus any service processing fees, if cancellation is done at least 24 hours prior to the session.
L.msg2: If cancellation is done in less than 24 hours from the session start time, the Athlete must contact the SSP to request a future credit or make-up session at the SSP's discretion.

C.msg1: Full refund, minus any service processing fees, if cancellation is done at least 5 days prior to the session.
C.msg2: If cancellation is done in less than 5 days from the session start time, the Athlete must contact the SSP to request a future credit or make-up session at the SSP's discretion.

N.msg1: 50% refund, minus any service processing fees, if cancellation is done at least 7 days prior to the session.
N.msg2: If cancellation is done in less than 7 days from the session start time, the Athlete must contact the SSP to request a future credit or make-up session at the SSP's discretion.

ValidationMessages.toEmpty: The "To" field must be filled in with a valid CoachList user

MessageUpcomingSessionNotMetMinRequiredP.messageDetails: The %{sessionLesson} : %{sessionName}, %{sport} you have scheduled on %{dateTime} at %{location} has not yet met the minimum number of participants you set.
MessageUpcomingSessionNotMetMinRequiredP.reason1: 1. Decrease the minimum number of required participants and hold the event as planned
MessageUpcomingSessionNotMetMinRequiredP.reason2: 2. Reschedule the event to give more time to increase the participant number
MessageUpcomingSessionNotMetMinRequiredP.reason3: 3. Cancel the event and an email will go out with the option for the scheduled participants to reschedule another session or request a credit towards another session or refund.
MessageUpcomingSessionNotMetMinRequiredP.pleaseTakeActions: Please take action immediately as the event will be automatically canceled if you do not make an adjustment.
MessageUpcomingSessionNotMetMinRequiredP.ifYouHaveAnyQuestions: If you have any questions or concerns, contact us at any time from your dashboard.

loggedInAsModal.heading: You are logging to following account
loggedInAsModal.name: Name

regBusinessModel.heading: Heres what youll be setting up today:
regBusinessModel.sportDesc: Tell us about your sports training credentials, specializations, biography & background, awards, training tools, and what services you offer athletes.
regBusinessModel.businessDesc: Choose a title, upload a profile picture or logo, tell us how far youre willing to travel, synchronize your calendars, set your cancellation policies and booking preferences.
regBusinessModel.sessionDesc: Set locations, dates and types of Sessions you train athletes  age, gender, skill level etc. and your availability, then build your calendar with sessions.
regBusinessModel.revenueDesc: Set your prices, offer volume and package discounts and more. Its free to register, and CoachList takes fees that range from 8-14% from the starter Entry Level up to the highest Gold Level.
regBusinessModel.revenueLearnMore: Learn more about rewards points & loyalty levels!
regBusinessModel.accountDesc: Provide your billing address, your user name, and how we can pay you. You can choose to get paid via paypal, direct deposit, or check.
regBusinessModel.comingSoonDesc1: CoachList CRM! A cost-effective solution to manage all your back-end office needs.
regBusinessModel.comingSoonDesc2: For just $40 per month you will get a full Customer Relationship Manager (CRM) and channel manager to manage your entire business, including a white-label system to promote your business, publish your calendar and reviews, and enable real-time bookings on your own website.

It would be awesome if we 16, 2017 from 7 - 8am at Sanborn Park. It would be awesome if we could train together!

DeleteCardModal.title: Are you want to delete this card ?

paymentErrorCodes.109: Request amount is too small to process the payment
paymentErrorCodes.114: Card or customer id is missing
paymentErrorCodes.118: Your card's expiration year is invalid.
paymentErrorCodes.119: Your card's expiration month is invalid.
paymentErrorCodes.120: Your card's security code is invalid.
paymentErrorCodes.122: Transaction not found with the given id
paymentErrorCodes.123: We could not block one or more schedules booked by you. If you proceed, you would be able to schedule them later. Otherwise, you may go back to the Shopping cart to see the affected schedules and re-plan.
paymentErrorCodes.128: We could not block one or more schedules booked by you. If you proceed, you would be able to schedule them later. Otherwise, you may go back to the Shopping cart to see the affected schedules and re-plan.
paymentErrorCodes.131: Athlete not available at the given time slot, We could not block one or more schedules booked by you. If you proceed, you would be able to schedule them later. Otherwise, you may go back to the Shopping cart to see the affected schedules and re-plan.
paymentErrorCodes.400: The request was unacceptable, often due to missing a required parameter.
paymentErrorCodes.402: The parameters were valid but the request failed.
paymentErrorCodes.409: The request conflicts with another request (perhaps due to using the same idempotent key).
paymentErrorCodes.429: Too many requests hit the API too quickly. We recommend an exponential backoff of your requests.
paymentErrorCodes.500: Something went wrong on payment server's end. (These are rare.)

PaymentProcessing.p2: Please do no not click back or refresh as we are procession your payment request.
PaymentProcessing.instruction: If you continue the payment, Session will be marked as unschedule (later you can schedule it from the dashboard), Or if you want to make changes click on "shopping cart".
